aws_cost_usage.name: EffectiveCost
aws_cost_usage.description: The amortized cost after all discounts. This is the 'true cost' of the resource.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: Preferred metric for all cost analysis and FinOps dashboards.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Always use SUM(EffectiveCost) to report on costs.

aws_cost_usage.name: UsageAmount
aws_cost_usage.description: The volume of usage consumed, in the unit specified by UsageUnit.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: To measure the quantity of a service used, e.g., 'hours' or 'GB'.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use SUM(UsageAmount) to get total consumption.

aws_cost_usage.name: ServiceName
aws_cost_usage.description: The name of the AWS service (e.g., 'Amazon EC2', 'Amazon S3').

expert_guidance.when_to_use: For filtering or grouping costs by service.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use in a GROUP BY clause or a WHERE clause (e.g., WHERE ServiceName = 'Amazon S3').

aws_cost_usage.name: RegionName
aws_cost_usage.description: The display name of the AWS region where the resource is located.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: For filtering or grouping costs by geographical region.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use in a GROUP BY clause or a WHERE clause. Filter out NULL values if necessary.

aws_cost_usage.name: BillingPeriodStart
aws_cost_usage.description: The inclusive start date of the billing period in YYYY-MM-DD format.

expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use substr(BillingPeriodStart, 1, 10) to get the date. Do NOT use strftime().

aws_cost_usage.name: UsageType
aws_cost_usage.description: Describes the specific usage details, e.g., 'BoxUsage:t3.micro'.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: To find usage by instance type or storage class.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: For EC2 instance types, use a query like: WHERE UsageType LIKE '%BoxUsage%'

azure_cost_usage.name: EffectiveCost
azure_cost_usage.description: The amortized cost after all discounts. This is the 'true cost' of the resource.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: Preferred metric for all cost analysis.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Always use SUM(EffectiveCost) to report on costs.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: To measure the quantity of a service used.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use SUM(UsageAmount) to get total consumption.

azure_cost_usage.name: ServiceName
azure_cost_usage.description: The name of the Azure service (e.g., 'Virtual Machines', 'Storage').

expert_guidance.when_to_use: For filtering or grouping costs by service.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use in a GROUP BY clause or a WHERE clause.

azure_cost_usage.name: ResourceLocation
azure_cost_usage.description: The display name of the Azure region where the resource is located.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: For filtering or grouping costs by geographical region.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use in a GROUP BY clause or a WHERE clause.

azure_cost_usage.name: UsageDateTime
azure_cost_usage.description: The inclusive start date of the usage in YYYY-MM-DD format.

expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use substr(UsageDateTime, 1, 10) to get the date. Do NOT use strftime().

azure_cost_usage.name: MeterCategory
azure_cost_usage.description: The top-level category for the service, e.g., 'Virtual Machines'.

expert_guidance.when_to_use: To find costs for broad categories like 'Compute' or 'Storage'.
expert_guidance.how_to_use: Use in a GROUP BY clause or a WHERE clause.
